summary: AN ORDINANCE related to cable television; granting Comcast of Washington I, Inc. and Comcast of Washington IV, Inc. a franchise for the Central Business Franchise District (CBFD); establishing terms and conditions for extending service in the CBFD; formally subjecting all franchise districts served by Comcast to the terms and conditions of Comcast's current franchise agreement; reflecting name changes of Comcast franchise grantees; and amending Exhibit A to Ordinance No. 117956 to reflect these changes.
